main.CRON_QUEUE_INACTIVITY_REMOVE: Players removed from the queue after inactivity
main.CRON_QUEUE_INACTIVITY_WARNING_TITLE: Players to be removed from queue in under 5 minutes!
main.CRON_QUEUE_INACTIVITY_WARNING_DESCRIPTIO: Click below to extend the time you have in Queue!

menu_collector.ACTIVE_MATCHES_DESCRIPTION: Click on a button to view the related match.
menu_collector.ACTIVE_MATCHES_INVALID: Invalid Match selected, please try again.
menu_collector.CANCEL_MODERATOR: Ask a mod to cancel this game for you!
menu_collector.PLAYER_DESCRIPTION: Did you win or lose this match?
menu_collector.MATCH_SUMMARY:
Team {{teamId}} won, the scores have been reported. Happy Playing! 

Rating breakdown for match given below.
menu_collector.MATCH_CANCELLED_DESCRIPTION: Any future attempts to report this score will not work.

interaction_create.NO_PERMISSION: You don't have permission to use this command
interaction_create.NO_PREMIUM: You need to be a premium user to use this feature.
interaction_create.MISSING_PERMISSIONS_FOOTER: I need the permissions listed above to allow me to run smoothly!
interaction_create.ERROR_UNKNOWN_DESCRIPTION: Post this code in the #error-report channel in the Private 6 Mans Support Server so that we can look into it.
interaction_create.ERROR_NO_EMBED: I can't create an embed, please fix that!

create_match.MATCH_ID: Match ID (use this when reporting the score)

vote_type.STARTER_TITLE: You have 2 minutes to vote. Vote by clicking the buttons below.
vote_type.STARTER_DESCRIPTION: This message needs to have **{{count}}** player interactions to proceed!
vote_type.RETURN_DESCRIPTION: The vote has been completed. The results are:

pick_players.EMBED_AUTHOR: This will time out in 2 minutes.
pick_players.EMBED_DESCRIPTION: Click below to pick players for your team.
pick_players.CAPTAIN_DM_ERROR: I can't send a DM to {{captain}}, are you allowing DMs? (Team Picking Cancelled)
pick_players.CAPTAIN_TIME_ERROR: {{captain}} out of time to choose players. (Team Picking Cancelled)

make_teams.EMBED_FIELD_VALUE: Captains will now pick their team members!
